Description: Limestone ostracon containing an administrative text / receipt written in Coptic.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Henri Édouard Naville (1893-94, on behalf of EEF)
Bibliographic references: Till 1964 / Die koptischen Rechtsurkunden aus Theben (p. 55)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (390732) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/390732)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Crum 170 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
